title: 【搬运】[1.8.1]Kaevator系列mod  timber framing木材框架mod(更新至v1.5)
author: huhu呼呼
txt_content:

http://v.minecraftxz.com/player.swf?ID=ix6czABnXAQv1.5:
- Corrected a bug preventing you from destroying the frames.


File:下载
Install Modloader 1.8.1←需要modloader

Kaevator_Timber_Framing_v1.4_MC_1.8.1.zip

Recipe:合成公式


Use:使用方法对其右键改变样式用颜料右键改变其颜色
